great builder strategy game even for its age its a blast

a fun romp of an older game a british wit caricature of 60s campy espionage from the vantage of the enemy the difficulty levels are no joke excellent game

after 2 missed the mark i honestly just wish theyd do a gentle remaster of this gem still holds up surprisingly well i highly recommend looking into the one big mod for the game that has bugfixes and rebalances helps the game cope with widescreen even at 4k its perfectly usable with that mod  absolute classic of its genre with a spoton theme
it was the best frikin game i ever played
really fun base building and i love the bond aesthetic and 90s computer game feel there are some game breaking bugs so make sure to save often

wanna be a evil master mind who desires to conquer the world  well this evil genius game is something you wanna play this game has all the characteristics towards being a evil genius  you can construct a hidden base steal all kinds of things including money and fight of against the forces of justice and goodness the game mechanics is quite simple and easy to play  and you will have a blast especially when dealing with those pesky agents
a true modern classic incredible artstyle and fantastic music and sound design a mustplay for management fans get the unofficial patch while youre at it
very fun game hope 2 is good
timeless game  love it

h1 the game is worth your time h1 however do keep you need to modify game to unlock 1080p and higher res 100 minion capacity sucks also some missions will raise heat that endless waves of soldiers come to your base  bugged super agents yeah i reccomend it but please play it with unoffical patch fixes the expirience
a classic strategy game  its sort of like a cold war spy themed dungeon keeper  never played anything else quite like this  i dont know if any of the remakes or sequels were any good
i just love this game its a childhood game but i still think its a great game sure its old but its good
really good game
while this game is packed with glitches and drags to a halt when you need a large amount of money it has a lot of charm
i loved this game so much i got a tattoo of it so let that speak of how good it is will hold a special place in my heart forever probably
good game overall squeal is worth buying if you havent bought this game yet
a real gem still much better than part 2

absolute classic  while the graphics are a bit dated  you can say that about any game near 2 decades old   but the game play stands up to the test of time casual gameplay that promotes tactical thinking over twitch skills  bad puns silly characters and a very camp overall feeling  i find this a fantastic game top marks
i played the second game before this one and despite its flaws its still a good game
love this game base building at its finest

the game had a few bugs but overall i enjoyed it a lot back in the days   it had fine comedy it was good strategy game where you built your base   balancing issues and bugs made it challenging to finish the game but i liked it enough to go trough the issues and finish it   so overall i would recommend this game if you like this type of games

will make you hate it if you try to finish it because you realize that some agents cant die until very very late in the game so its fun and enjoyable for a few hours but itll anger you nearing the end game i needed a trainer to avoid dumping 40 more hours into it for the incessant enemy special agents attack that devastate your base and henchmen regardless of your technological level and advancement

even after years it is still awesome great cartoon humor long playtime and overall fun to play
